00010 namespace glm{
00011 
00012 // Min comparison between 2 variables
00013 template<typename T, typename U, precision P>
00014 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER U associatedMin(T x, U a, T y, U b)
00015 {
00016         return x < y ? a : b;
00017 }
00018 
00019 template<typename T, typename U, precision P>
00020 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tvec2<U, P> associatedMin
00021 (
00022         const detail::tvec2<T, P>& x, const detail::tvec2<U, P>& a,
00023         const detail::tvec2<T, P>& y, const detail::tvec2<U, P>& b
00024 )
00025 {
00026         detail::tvec2<U, P> Result;
00027         //Result.x = x[0] < y[0] ? a[0] : b[0];
00028         //Result.y = x[1] < y[1] ? a[1] : b[1];
00029         for(typename detail::tvec2<U, P>::size_type i = 0; i < Result.length(); ++i)
00030                 Result[i] = x[i] < y[i] ? a[i] : b[i];
00031         return Result;
00032 }
00033

00045 }

00138 // Min comparison between 3 variables
00139 template<typename T, typename U>
00140 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER U associatedMin
00141 (
00142         T x, U a,
00143         T y, U b,
00144         T z, U c
00145 )
00146 {
00147         U Result = x < y ? (x < z ? a : c) : (y < z ? b : c);
00148         return Result;
00149 }
00150 
00151 template<typename T, typename U, precision P>
00152 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tvec2<U, P> associatedMin
00153 (
00154         const detail::tvec2<T, P>& x, const detail::tvec2<U, P>& a,
00155         const detail::tvec2<T, P>& y, const detail::tvec2<U, P>& b,
00156         const detail::tvec2<T, P>& z, const detail::tvec2<U, P>& c
00157 )
00158 {
00159         detail::tvec2<U, P> Result;
00160         for(typename detail::tvec2<U, P>::size_type i = 0; i < Result.length(); ++i)
00161                 Result[i] = x[i] < y[i] ? (x[i] < z[i] ? a[i] : c[i]) : (y[i] < z[i] ? b[i] : c[i]);
00162         return Result;
00163 }

00183         const detail::tvec4<T, P>& y, const detail::tvec4<U, P>& b,
00184         const detail::tvec4<T, P>& z, const detail::tvec4<U, P>& c

00188         for(typename detail::tvec4<U, P>::size_type i = 0; i < Result.length(); ++i)
00189                 Result[i] = x[i] < y[i] ? (x[i] < z[i] ? a[i] : c[i]) : (y[i] < z[i] ? b[i] : c[i]);

00193 // Min comparison between 4 variables
00194 template<typename T, typename U>
00195 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER U associatedMin
00196 (
00197         T x, U a,
00198         T y, U b,
00199         T z, U c,
00200         T w, U d
00201 )
00202 {
00203         T Test1 = min(x, y);
00204         T Test2 = min(z, w);;
00205         U Result1 = x < y ? a : b;
00206         U Result2 = z < w ? c : d;
00207         U Result = Test1 < Test2 ? Result1 : Result2;
00208         return Result;
00209 }
00210 
00211 // Min comparison between 4 variables
00212 template<typename T, typename U, precision P>
00213 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tvec2<U, P> associatedMin
00214 (
00215         const detail::tvec2<T, P>& x, const detail::tvec2<U, P>& a,
00216         const detail::tvec2<T, P>& y, const detail::tvec2<U, P>& b,
00217         const detail::tvec2<T, P>& z, const detail::tvec2<U, P>& c,
00218         const detail::tvec2<T, P>& w, const detail::tvec2<U, P>& d
00219 )
00220 {
00221         detail::tvec2<U, P> Result;
00222         for(typename detail::tvec2<U, P>::size_type i = 0; i < Result.length(); ++i)
00223         {
00224                 T Test1 = min(x[i], y[i]);
00225                 T Test2 = min(z[i], w[i]);
00226                 U Result1 = x[i] < y[i] ? a[i] : b[i];
00227                 U Result2 = z[i] < w[i] ? c[i] : d[i];
00228                 Result[i] = Test1 < Test2 ? Result1 : Result2;
00229         }
00230         return Result;
00231 }

00288         T Test2 = min(z, w);
00289 
00290         detail::tvec2<U, P> Result;

00300 // Min comparison between 4 variables
00301 template<typename T, typename U, precision P>
00302 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tvec3<U, P> associatedMin
00303 (
00304         T x, const detail::tvec3<U, P>& a,
00305         T y, const detail::tvec3<U, P>& b,
00306         T z, const detail::tvec3<U, P>& c,
00307         T w, const detail::tvec3<U, P>& d
00308 )
00309 {
00310         T Test1 = min(x, y);
00311         T Test2 = min(z, w);
00312 
00313         detail::tvec3<U, P> Result;
00314         for(typename detail::tvec3<U, P>::size_type i = 0; i < detail::tvec3<U, P>::value_size; ++i)
00315         {
00316                 U Result1 = x < y ? a[i] : b[i];
00317                 U Result2 = z < w ? c[i] : d[i];
00318                 Result[i] = Test1 < Test2 ? Result1 : Result2;
00319         }
00320         return Result;
00321 }

00531 // Max comparison between 2 variables
00532 template<typename T, typename U, precision P>
00533 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tvec4<U, P> associatedMax
00534 (
00535         const detail::tvec4<T, P>& x, U a,
00536         const detail::tvec4<T, P>& y, U b
00537 )
00538 {
00539         detail::tvec4<U, P> Result;
00540         for(typename detail::tvec4<T, P>::size_type i = 0; i < Result.length(); ++i)
00541                 Result[i] = x[i] > y[i] ? a : b;
00542         return Result;
00543 }

00545 // Max comparison between 3 variables
00546 template<typename T, typename U>
00547 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER U associatedMax
00548 (
00549         T x, U a,
00550         T y, U b,
00551         T z, U c
00552 )
00553 {
00554         U Result = x > y ? (x > z ? a : c) : (y > z ? b : c);
00555         return Result;
00556 }

00693 // Max comparison between 4 variables
00694 template<typename T, typename U>
00695 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER U associatedMax
00696 (
00697         T x, U a,
00698         T y, U b,
00699         T z, U c,
00700         T w, U d
00701 )
00702 {
00703         T Test1 = max(x, y);
00704         T Test2 = max(z, w);;
00705         U Result1 = x > y ? a : b;
00706         U Result2 = z > w ? c : d;
00707         U Result = Test1 > Test2 ? Result1 : Result2;
00708         return Result;
00709 }
